game.name: One man's junk
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Hassle the unsuspecting residents of Chislington in order to barter your way up from a paperclip to a car, so you can go visit your family for the holidays.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hassle the unsuspecting residents of Chislington in order to barter your way up from a paperclip to a car, so you can go visit your family for the holidays.
